body: Oh that's interesting. So updateOutput used to accept non-contiguous bias, but you've decided to tighten it up here because the forwards doesn't accept noncontiguous bias either, is that right?
body_html: Oh that's interesting. So updateOutput used to accept non-contiguous bias, but you've decided to tighten it up here because the forwards doesn't accept noncontiguous bias either, is that right?
body_text: Oh that's interesting. So updateOutput used to accept non-contiguous bias, but you've decided to tighten it up here because the forwards doesn't accept noncontiguous bias either, is that right?
